name: Christ The Redeemer
fact: Christ The Redeemer stands 125 feet tall

name: Great Pyramids
fact: The Egyptian Pyramids were used as tombs for Pharoahs.

name: Grand Canyon
fact: The Grand Canyone is over a mile deep in some areas.

name: Great Wall Of China
fact: The Great Wall crosses 9 provinces and municipalities

name: Roman Colesseum
fact: There were 36 trap doors allowing for elaborate special effects

name: Machu Piccu
fact: n 2007, Machu Picchu was voted one of the New Seven Wonders of the World in a worldwide Internet poll.

name: Eiffel Tower
fact: The Eiffel Tower was going to be demolished in 1909, but was saved because it was repurposed as a giant radio antenna.
